article:
'Collected' (aka Seed 1) is a 2005 promotional DVD, freely distributed in
limited supply by Nine Inch Nails. It is a 23-minute collection of clips from
various Nine Inch Nails music videos, interview clips, and the complete video
for "The Hand That Feeds", as well as an interactive "body of work" discography
that appears on later releases. The DVD is censored with the exception of the
"body of work" section.

While there is no scene selection menu, the Collected features 16 chapter stops:

# A quick preview of the listed clips begins the DVD. (The following five
# clips are only contained in this preview.) *"Pinion" (1992) *"Help Me I Am in
# Hell" (1992) *"March of the Pigs" (1994) *"Starfuckers, Inc." (2000) *"Deep"
# (2001) "Down in It" (1989) "Head Like a Hole" (1990) "Sin" (1990) [[Broken
# (1993 film)|Broken]] (1992) â Clips of "Wish", "Happiness in Slavery", and
# "Gave Up" ([[Closure (Nine Inch Nails VHS)|Closure]]) "Closer" (1994)
# "Woodstock" (1994) â Live clip of "Reptile" "" (1994â1996) â Interview clip
# and live clip of "March of the Pigs" (from Closure) "" (listed as 1994,
# actually 1995) "Burn" (1994) and "The Perfect Drug" (1997) (Both clips are
# part of Chapter 10.) "We're in This Together" (1999) "Into the Void" (1999) ""
# (1999â2000) â Live clips of "The Great Below" and "The Wretched" (both from
# [[And All that Could Have Been]]) "" (2002) "The Hand That Feeds" (2005)
# Following this video is the full [[With Teeth]] teaser featuring "Beside You
# in Time" that was originally posted February 12, 2005 at the official Nine
# Inch Nails website. [http://www.nin.com/visuals/with_teeth_teaser.html
# nine inch nails ] The last two seconds of the
# copyright notice
